SEARCH
Module dragonix.fierydragons1
Package dragonix.fierydragons1

Class Game

java.lang.Object
dragonix.fierydragons1.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents the core logic of the Fiery Dragons game. It manages player turns, movement, game state, timers, and interactions with the game board.

    • initializeNewGame

      public void initializeNewGame(Deque<Player> playersQueue, List<javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle> volcanoRectangles, List<javafx.scene.image.ImageView> dragonTokens, List<javafx.scene.control.Button> dragonButtons, List<Cave> caveList)
      Initializes a new game with the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      playersQueue - The queue of players participating in the game.
      volcanoRectangles - The list of rectangles representing volcanoes on the game board.
      dragonTokens - The list of image views representing dragon tokens.
      dragonButtons - The list of buttons representing dragon cards.
      caveList - The list of caves on the game board.

    • startTurn

      public void startTurn()
      Starts the turn timer for the current player.

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      Advances the game to the next player in the queue. This method polls the current player from the queue and offers them back to the end.

    • moveCurrentPlayerBy

      public boolean moveCurrentPlayerBy(int offset)
      Moves the current player by the specified offset.
      Parameters:
      offset - The number of steps to move the player.
      Returns:
      True if the move was successful, false otherwise.

      Retrieves the current player.

      Throws:
